title.rendered: Victoria Inner Harbour Airport in British Columbia, Victoria, Canada

content.rendered:
Verified & Updated on: 13/02/21

Victoria Inner Harbour Airport in British Columbia, Victoria, Canada Address, Phone number, Lost and Found contact

Victoria Inner Harbour Airport British Columbia, Victoria Address: 950 Wharf Street
Victoria, BC
V8W 1T3

Phone number: +1 800-665-0212

Business hours: Monday To Friday: 6:00 Am To 9:00 Pm
Saturday And Sunday: 7:00 Am To 7:00 Pm

Victoria Inner Harbour Airport Official website: https://www.harbourair.com/flight-info/flight/locations/victoria-harbour/

Victoria Inner Harbour Airport Facebook :https://www.facebook.com/pages/harbour-air-seaplanes/372520537063-ref=search&sid=100000851067128.1692632881..1

IATA code: YWH

ICAO code: CYWH

WMO code: 71961

Facilities and Services at Victoria Inner Harbour Airport

  • WiFi
  • Newspapers
  • Mobile device charging station
  • Coffee, tea, fruit and baked goods

Due to COVID-19 we are not currently offering newspapers, fruit and baked goods in the terminal.

  • Car Rentals
  • Parking

Car Rental Services at Victoria Inner Harbour Airport

National Car Rental reservations are available from our terminals located in downtown Vancouver and Richmond (YVR South). Budget Rent-A-Car rentals are available from our terminals located in Victoria, Nanaimo, Maple Bay, Comox and Tofino.

For rentals within 24 hours, please contact our Reservations Centre by calling
Phone number: 18006650212

Shuttle Service at Victoria Inner Harbour Airport

Richmond (YVR South)
Phone number: 6048094643

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Victoria Inner Harbour Airport in British Columbia, Victoria Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Victoria Inner Harbour Airport in British Columbia, Victoria: (click on the stars below)
